tweet: ...at potluck sat down & talked to girl about heading to Nola for music, she runs down to her car & brings back her accordian & glockenspiel
On drive to potluck, Celtic fiddle hums thru speakers. Conversation about harp & banjo leads to me revealing desire to learn accordian...
Arrived to the sounds of Django & smell of baked brie at my hosts' home in Pittsburgh. Its beautiful here at night.
Driving through the land of mountains, Mennonites & mills.
Ah, free country road. Much better. Gorgeous weather, golden leaves & green rolling hills. Breathe.
